definition[0]: if something opens the floodgates, or if the floodgates open, it suddenly becomes possible for a lot of things to happen which were prevented from happening before
example[0]: If this case is successful it could open the floodgates for thousands of similar claims.
example[1]: There are fears that the floodgates will open and large numbers of parents will take their children out of school.
definition[1]: if the floodgates open, or if something opens the floodgates, someone begins to cry and show their emotions after keeping them hidden
example[2]: His display of kindness to her opened the floodgates again, and she began to sob loudly.
